content.raw:
Hi @{557058:6ff86fcb-b7ab-44a5-b8a6-f6d9cae8b6e8} , I’m here to give an update. After running the simulator using tutortial from [#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupDockerhub](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupDockerhub), I have succeeded in generating the whole map but the problem with the joystick still remains and I still unable to control the robot using the joystick. I will attach the result from my simulator for you. Thanks.

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/4174750596-Screenshot_from_2019-07-26_11-50-53.png)
Update: I now can control the robot using `roslaunch pub`, the joystick is still not working.
content.html:
Hi @Louise Poubel , I’m here to give an update. After running the simulator using tutortial from #!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupDockerhub, I have succeeded in generating the whole map but the problem with the joystick still remains and I still unable to control the robot using the joystick. I will attach the result from my simulator for you. Thanks.

Update: I now can control the robot using roslaunch pub, the joystick is still not working.
